https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/dIgBQkGaWj8eANdbiy8zwdaqPgA.jpg In 2011 the young married Swiss couple Daniela Widmer and David Och got kidnapped while being on a long trip along the old Silk Road in Pakistan. They were hand over to the Taliban and were held as hostages for 8 months under the most precarious conditions. And Tomorrow You Will Be Dead
